name: Zoom
description: Integration with Zoom to create, schedule, update, and manage meetings.

list_meetings.description: List all scheduled meetings for a user. Returns upcoming and past meetings with details like topic, start time, and duration.

user_id.description: The user ID or email address. Use 'me' for the authenticated user.

page_size.description: Number of meetings to return per page (max 300).

next_page_token.description: Token for pagination to get the next page of results.

type.description: Meeting type (1=instant, 2=scheduled, 3=recurring no fixed time, 8=recurring fixed time)

start_time.description: Meeting start time in ISO format

next_page_token.description: Token for next page of results

get_meeting.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific meeting including settings, host info, and join URLs.

start_url.description: URL for host to start the meeting

create_meeting.description: Create a new Zoom meeting with customizable settings including topic, time, duration, and meeting options.

user_id.description: The user ID or email address of the host. Use 'me' for authenticated user.

type.description: Meeting type: 1=instant, 2=scheduled, 3=recurring no fixed time, 8=recurring fixed time.

start_time.description: Meeting start time in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2024-01-15T10:00:00Z). Required for scheduled meetings.

join_before_host.description: Allow participants to join before host.

start_url.description: URL for host to start the meeting

update_meeting.description: Update an existing meeting's details including topic, time, duration, and settings.

start_time.description: New start time in ISO 8601 format.

delete_meeting.description: Delete a scheduled meeting. Cannot delete meetings that have already ended.

occurrence_id.description: For recurring meetings, specify the occurrence ID to delete a single occurrence.

get_user.description: Get detailed information about a specific user including settings and permissions.

user_id.description: The user ID or email address. Use 'me' for authenticated user.

get_meeting_participants.description: Get the list of participants who attended a past meeting. Only works for ended meetings.

add_meeting_registrant.description: Register a participant for a scheduled meeting that requires registration.

create_calendar_event.description: Create a new calendar event with specified details including summary, start/end time, location, and attendees.

calendar_id.description: The calendar ID. Use 'primary' for the primary calendar.

start.description: Start time object with dateTime and timeZone properties.

end.description: End time object with dateTime and timeZone properties.

delete_calendar_event.description: Delete a calendar event by its ID.

calendar_id.description: The calendar ID. Use 'primary' for the primary calendar.

quick_create_calendar_event.description: Quickly create a calendar event using natural language text (e.g., 'Meeting tomorrow at 3pm').

calendar_id.description: The calendar ID. Use 'primary' for the primary calendar.

text.description: Natural language text describing the event (e.g., 'Team meeting tomorrow at 2pm').

update_calendar_metadata.description: Update a calendar's metadata including summary, description, and timezone.

get_calendar_metadata.description: View a calendar's metadata including summary, description, timezone, and access role.

calendar_id.description: The calendar ID. Use 'primary' for the primary calendar.

primary.description: Whether this is the primary calendar

get_calendar_event.description: View details of a specific calendar event.

calendar_id.description: The calendar ID. Use 'primary' for the primary calendar.

list_calendar_events.description: View calendar events with optional filtering by time range and search query.

calendar_id.description: The calendar ID. Use 'primary' for the primary calendar.

time_min.description: Lower bound for event start time in ISO 8601 format.

time_max.description: Upper bound for event start time in ISO 8601 format.

max_results.description: Maximum number of events to return (max 2500).
Maximum number of settings to return.

list_contacts.description: View contacts from Zoom with optional filtering by type and search.

create_meeting_template.description: Create a meeting template from an existing meeting.

user_id.description: The user ID. Use 'me' for authenticated user.

meeting_id.description: The meeting ID to create a template from.

create_meeting_invite_links.description: Create personalized invite links for meeting attendees.

attendees.description: List of attendees to create invite links for.

ttl.description: Time to live for the invite links in seconds.

get_meeting_participant.description: View details of a specific meeting participant.

get_past_meeting.description: View details of a past meeting including duration and participant count.

get_meeting_template_detail.description: Get detailed information about a user's meeting template.

user_id.description: The user ID. Use 'me' for authenticated user.

get_user_permissions.description: View a user's permissions in Zoom.

user_id.description: The user ID. Use 'me' for authenticated user.
